title: BANNED ACCOUNT DUE TO SCRIPTING
body: Hello, I recently got banned for scripting that i did not do, I noticed some odd games recently of someone playing but i thought it was just me, so i left it but then when i got banned i must have realised that someone was on my account using scripts. I have asked riot to check the ip address of which their account was banned but they have not responded yet.. Please help me

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you believe your account has been compromised you'll need to submit a ticket and go through the account recovery process, which it sounds like you've already begun. 

Note that due to the recent ban wave of people using 3rd party programs Player Support is currently swamped with tickets so it might take a little while to get a reply. If you account truly was compromised then you should have no problem returning the account to its original state.
